abilities.name: Keen Smell.
abilities.description: The catoblepas has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

abilities.name: Stench.
abilities.description: Any creature other than a catoblepas that starts its turn within 10 feet of the catoblepas must succeed on a DC 16 Constitution saving throw or be poisoned until the start of the creature's next turn. On a successful saving throw, the creature is immune to the stench of any catoblepas for 1 hour.
